content: wrap total with a knit stitch in between each heel by knitting through all three legs loop resolve these loops by k2tog round 2-3 knit all stitches stitch before the loop stitch and the loop round 4 starting this round we will be stitch on the following round creating our color bloom where the yarn changes colors depending on how long round 5-31 knit all stitches creating each section is you can knit a few stitches blooms when yarn color changes before creating your bloom for the resolving the blooms on the following anna s hummingbird color i started the round blooms when the yarn was bright pink round 32 knit all stitches rather than at the transition color round 33-49 k1 p1 ribbing for 16 rounds to create this pop of color or flower bind off using jeny s surprisingly bloom insert your right needle into the stretchy bind off finish by weaving in stitch that is 2 stitches to the left and 3 ends washing in your favorite wool row down on your left hand needle as wash and block shown in yellow in the drawing pull up a loop in this lower stitch using your right needle knit 1 stitch from your left needle pull up a second loop in the same lower stitch as before now 1 stitch to the left 3 row down knit 1 stitch from your left needle pull up a third loop in the same lower stitch this stitch will now be to the right and 3 row down finally knit 1 stitch from your left needle all other stitches are knit to resolve the bloom stitches we will knit the stitch before the loop and the loop stitch together k2tog three times on the following round to create a larger bloom for longer color sections such as on the 2025 color insert the right needle into the stitch 3 to the left on your left hand
